column3: â€œThis is a very sweet and floral bud. It provides a very smooth vape.  It hits you right upfront, making you feel like you have drunk 2 or 3 glasses of wine.  That effect transitions into a warmth that surges up from your core and out through your throat.  This body high is a warm and cozy feeling.  This strain provides for a beautiful relaxation effect making areas of muscle tension fade away. You will definitely exp...â€

â€œExperience: A heavy high, slight tingling in the fingertips; inebriating, sedating, spacy, and slow. An opioid-like high, as if drinking a bottle of cough syrup, but without the paranoia. Relaxes the muscles in your face and body. Smoke it and become a soft, space-marshmallowâ€¦
Usage: Would recommend for nighttime. Best to unplug and go to bed.

â€œBy the power of Greyskull!! This lady is da tits! Very energetic and happy/talky. I was not expecting the flavor and was pleasantly surprised! A little chemy but over sweet and berry flavors. Blueberry is one of my favorites, and this girl took a lot from its parent! Very good!â€

â€œThis stuff is too good! Made the car smell like fruity pebbles. I've had blue dream and train wreck a few times each and this is an ultimate medium between these two great strains. Quality stuff! Taylor gang onifcâ€

â€œOne of my favorite sativa hybrid dominant flowers ever. This is an excellent pain reliever, it smells great, it tastes great and it has a very relaxing head high and deep body high... myself and another both fell asleep after smoking this . The next day my back pain and sciatica pain were not present and did not show for several hours. Not only did it help the pain when I smoked it but the next morning when I woke up...â€

â€œThis is a powerful combo, both these strains make it into my top 5 so I knew I was going to like the cross. Pretty much anything crossed with blueberry I will give a go. 

The buds were as expected, t'd up and very smelly, busting it up you get a bit of a sweet and spicey berry.
Upon smoking/vaping it that sweet and spicey berry comes out nicely on the after taste. The blueberry is very prominant in this mix.

â€œone of the best buds i've ever got.. atleast this batch from a local dispo is really good.... buds are like rocks they actually look like the moon rocks dipped in kief. and dense as rock.. bigger than average buds with a blue hue to them... smoke is fantastic, smooth with a perfect balance of sativa and indica... takes a few to kick in but it's strong top notch for sure... got an o, would buy the whole lot.â€

â€œVery nice indica dominant hybrid.  Tastes pretty nice and brings a very nice cerebral high, but without the normal shlumpification that comes hand in hand with most indicas is not seen here as the sativa side of this strain brings enough energy to combat this.  Solid strain if you want to just get shconed and listen to music or if you've got some trouble falling asleep.â€

â€œFinally, a strain to put my mind at rest. Taste is on the stronger, earthier side. After splitting a half gram joint with a friend, the true serenity and peace of the spirit of the plant set in. Light body awareness and everything becomes simple and clear. The feeling was, nothing to do, nowhere to go, just simple positivity. Eating food was rhythmic, calming and delicious. No eye or mouth dryness. I forgot my worrie...â€

â€œGood uplifting effects yet calming down stress after first few hits. High creates a happy atmosphere for too short of a high. Doesnâ€™t fully remove pain but you simply find yourself laughing at something that makes you forget your pain.â€

â€œSuper chill mode is the best way to describe this. I did not get the energizing effects described by others at all, but I will try again at some point to confirm. I've tried several Blueberry crosses and this carries the least aroma and flavor, but more of the indica affects than expected. Needs more prominence of both parents to impress.â€

â€œThis is a great daytime strain for when I need to be a little more focused. It's a nice, mellow high, enough to get me relaxed, bit still be able to go hiking, go to the gym, our get some serious work done.â€

â€œWow, this is some good stuff. Picked up 3 g's and honestly only need one bowl to get stoned. You can feel the haziness and the craziness from the trainwreck, but there's this light euphoria and bliss in the background from the Blue Dream. i would say it's a 75/25 sativa dominant hybrid. makes you really aroused also. not good for if you need to get stuff though but perfect weekend bud. 9/10, really dense nugsâ€
â€œI used this stain for the first time to help me get to sleep in the evenings and holy wow.. Its working.â€

â€œI was going to write something about this strain but then I smoked it and its been 45 minutes and I just cant stop laughing... I feel so relaxed and giggly.  I would suggest everyone try some. Delicious and pungent!!! Nice Full Nugs!â€
